Hearing a future self's thoughts: Wow, you're doing great! You've achieved so much more than you thought possible. You've traveled to new and exciting places, started a successful business, and found true love. Your future self is so proud of you and can't wait to see what you'll accomplish next.

Hearing a past self's thoughts: Wow, you were so much smarter than you thought! You made some incredible decisions that led to where you are now. You took risks, learned from your mistakes, and never gave up on your dreams. Your past self is impressed with how far you've come and can't wait to see what the future holds.

Hearing a parallel universe self's thoughts: Hmm, interesting. It seems like you made a different choice in a parallel universe. You're now living a completely different life, with different people, places, and experiences. Your parallel self is intrigued by the choices you made and is curious to see how they've shaped your life.

Hearing a future self from a different timeline's thoughts: Whoa, you're in a completely different timeline than you thought! It seems like you made a choice that altered the course of your life. Your future self from this timeline is doing great, but they're also struggling with some challenges. They're glad you're here to help them through this tough time.

Hearing a self from a parallel dimension's thoughts: Incredible! It seems like you're from a parallel dimension where everything is the opposite of your own reality. Your thoughts are coming from a self who lives in a world where gravity pulls you upwards instead of down, and where time moves in reverse. They're fascinated by your world and are eager to learn more about it.
